text: 1.11 Mat 23.14, Jon 10.12, 1 Ti 6.5, 2 Ti 3.6, 1 Pi 5.2 Bɨ takaw tep yɨbɨl ak tɨbɨlɨkɨpal okok, mani tap okok dun agɨl, binɨb yokɨp okok kɨlop anɨgɨl anɨgɨl gɨnɨmɨb agɨl, takaw apal ak yepɨs apal. Agel, apɨlɨgon amɨlɨgon ñapay kɨli ogɨnap Klays nop gos nepal ak kelɨgɨl apyap pakɨpal. Anɨb ak kɨlop agenɨmɨb, takaw agebal anɨb ak kelɨgɨnɨgel.
